Description: Carved and painted wooden shabti of Ast-...., a Chantress of Amun with a black lappet-wig, a modelled face with black eyes and a red and blue collar; the hands are unmarked; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs (worn).
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore (?)
